tit.cmt: タイトルなので用語補足を削除しました。

sen.j: 陰陽寮（おんみょうりょう）は、律令制日本の律令制において中務省に属する機関のひとつ。
sen.e: The Onmyoryo is one of the bureaus in the Ministry of Central Affairs under the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).
sen.cmt: 「律令制日本の」の部分は訳出していません。(ウィキペディアのページで確認し、リンクが表示されていると判断しました。)
sen.e: The Onmyoryo was one of the bureaus in the Ministry of Central Affairs under the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).
The Onmyoryo was one of the bureaus in Nakatsukasasho (Ministry of Central Affairs) under the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).

sen.j: 占い・天文・時・暦の編纂を担当する部署。
sen.e: It is the department in charge of the compilation of fortune-telling, astronomy, time, and calendar.
The department was responsible for the compilation of fortune-telling, astronomy, time, and calendar.
sen.cmt: "It is the department in charge of" > "The department was responsible for"
sen.e: The department was responsible for the compilation of fortune-telling, astronomy, time, and calendar.

sen.j: 天平宝字2年（758年）から8年まで「太史局」と改名されていた。
sen.e: From 758 to 764, it was renamed to Taishi department.
It was renamed the 'Taishi department' (Bureau of Divination) between 758 and 764.
It was renamed the 'Taishi department' (Bureau of Divination) between 758 and 764.

sen.j: 長官は陰陽頭で、陰陽道に基づく呪術を行う陰陽師がいる。
sen.e: Onmyo no kami (director of Onmyoryo) is the kami (director), and Onmyoji (master of Yin yang) who do magic (a spell) based on Onmyodo (way of Yin and Yang; occult divination system based on the Taoist theory of the five elements) are in the bureau.

The Onmyo no Kami was the director of the bureau which was staffed by Onmyoji (yin and yang practitioners) who performed spells based on Onmyodo (way of Yin and Yang; an occult divination system based on the Taoist theory of the five elements).

The Onmyo no Kami was the director of the bureau which was staffed by Onmyoji (yin and yang practitioners) who performed spells based on Onmyodo (way of Yin and Yang; an occult divination system based on the Taoist theory of the five elements).

sen.j: さらに陰陽師を養成する陰陽博士、占星術を行使・教授する天文博士、暦の編纂・暦作成を教授する暦博士が設置されている。
sen.e: Additionally there are an onmyo hakase (master of Onmyo) who trains Onmyoji, a tenmon hakase (master of astronomy) who does and teaches astrology, and a reki hakase (master of reki or calendar) who teaches compiling and making reki.

There was also an Onmyo Hakase (ying and yang master) who trained onmyoji, a Tenmon Hakase (master of astronomy) who practiced and taught astronomy, and a Reki Hakase (calendar master) who compiled and created calendars.
sen.cmt: Retranslated due to poor translation陰陽博士 - "onmyo hakase (master of onmyo)" > "Onmyo Hakase (ying and yang masters)"暦博士 - "reki hakase (master of reki (calendar)" > "Reki Hakase (calendar masters)"
sen.e: There was also an Onmyo Hakase (ying and yang master) who trained onmyoji, a Tenmon Hakase (master of astronomy) who practiced and taught astronomy, and a Reki Hakase (calendar master) who compiled and created calendars.

sen.j: その下で学生・得業生が学ぶ。
sen.e: Students and tokugosho (selected students) learn from these hakase.
Gakusei (students) and tokugosho (top students) studied under these staff members.
sen.cmt: Retranslated due to poor translation"得業生 - tokugosho (selected student)" >
sen.e: Gakusei (students) and tokugyo no sho (student like postgraduate, student taking the graduate program) studied under these staff members.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: また、漏刻博士は時計（漏刻）を管理して時報を行う。
sen.e: Rokoku hakase (master of clock) control water clocks and announce time.
In addition, the Rokoku Hakase (clock master) managed the water clocks and announced the time.
sen.cmt: Retranslated due to poor translation漏刻博士 - "rokoku hakase (master of clock)" > "Rokoku Hakase (clock master)"
sen.e: In addition, the Rokoku Hakase (clock master) managed the water clocks and announced the time.

sen.j: 陰陽師安倍晴明もこのうちの天文博士に任命されている。
sen.e: Onmyoji ABE no Seimei was also assigned to a tenmon hakase which is one of these hakase.
The Onmyoji ABE no Seimei was assigned to one of the institution's Tenmon Hakase.
The Onmyoji ABE no Seimei was assigned to one of the institution's Tenmon Hakase.

sen.j: 明治2年に陰陽頭土御門晴雄が死去し、嫡男の土御門晴栄の代の明治3年（1870年）に廃止された。
sen.e: Onmyo no kami Haruo TSUCHIMIKADO passed away in 1869, and the Onmyoryo was abolished in 1870 when his legitimate eldest son, Harenaga TSUCHIMIKADO was Onmyo no kami.
The Onmyo no Kami Haruo TSUCHIMIKADO passed away in 1869, and the Onmyoryo was abolished in 1870 during the time of his heir, Harenaga TSUCHIMIKADO.
sen.cmt: Added "The""when his legitimate eldest son, Harenaga TSUCHIMIKADO was Onmyo no kami" > "during the time of his heir, Harenaga TSUCHIMIKADO"
sen.e: The Onmyo no Kami Haruo TSUCHIMIKADO passed away in 1869, and the Onmyoryo was abolished in 1870 during the time of his heir, Harenaga TSUCHIMIKADO.

sen.j: 頭（従五位下相当）1人
sen.e: 1 kashira (head, equivalent to Jugoinoge or Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade)
1 kashira (head, equivalent to Jugoinoge or Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade)
1 kami (director, equivalent to Jugoinoge [Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade])
sen.cmt: 前出内容に合わせて読みを変えました。

sen.j: 助（従六位上相当）1人
sen.e: 1 suke (deputy director, equivalent to Jurokuinojo or Junior Sixth Rank, Upper Grade)
sen.cmt: リンクが表示されていたため、ウィキペディアのウェブサイト通りに原文を変更しました。
sen.e: 1 suke (deputy director, equivalent to Jurokuinojo or Junior Sixth Rank, Upper Grade)
1 suke (deputy director, equivalent to Jurokuinojo [Junior Sixth Rank, Upper Grade])

sen.j: 允（従七位上相当）1人
sen.e: 1 jo (secretary, equivalent to Jushichiinojo or Junior Seventh Rank, Upper Grade)
sen.cmt: リンクが表示されていたため、ウェブサイトの通りに原文を変更しました。
sen.e: 1 jo (secretary, equivalent to Jushichiinojo or Junior Seventh Rank, Upper Grade)
1 jo (secretary, equivalent to Jushichiinojo [Junior Seventh Rank, Upper Grade])

sen.j: 大属（従八位下相当） 少属（大初位上相当）各1人
sen.e: 1 daizoku (senior clerk, equivalent to Juhachiinoge or Junior Eighth Rank, Lower Grade) and 1 shosakan (junior clerk, equivalent to Daishoijo or Dai 1st Rank, Upper Grade)
sen.cmt: リンクが表示されていたため、ウェブサイトの通りに原文を変更しました。
sen.e: 1 daizoku (senior clerk, equivalent to Juhachiinoge or Junior Eighth Rank, Lower Grade) and 1 shosakan (junior clerk, equivalent to Daishoijo or Dai 1st Rank, Upper Grade)
1 daisakan (senior clerk, equivalent to Juhachiinoge [Junior Eighth Rank, Lower Grade]) and 1 shosakan (junior clerk, equivalent to Daihatsuinojo [Greater Initial Rank, Upper Grade])
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 史生 新設
sen.e: Shisho (a person doing miscellaneous duties about documents), newly created
Shisho (low-ranking clerks), newly created
sen.cmt: 史生 - "Shisho (a person doing miscellaneous duties about documents)" > "Shisho (low-ranking clerks)"
sen.e: Shisho (low-ranking clerks), newly created

sen.j: 寮掌 新設
sen.e: Ryosho (a person doing miscellaneous duties in the bureau), newly created
Ryosho (low-ranking administrators), newly created
sen.cmt: "a person doing miscellaneous duties in the bureau" > "ow-ranking administrators"
sen.e: Ryosho (administrative official, secretary, commissioner), newly created
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 使部 20人
sen.e: 20 shibe (low rank bureaucrats)
20 shibe (low-ranking bureaucrats)
20 shibu (low-ranking bureaucrats)
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 直丁 2人
sen.e: 2 jikicho (factotums)
2 jikicho (factotums)
2 jikicho (factotums)

sen.j: 以下は技術・教育などを担当。
sen.e: Followings are in charge of technology or education.
The following were responsible for skills and education.
The followings were responsible for skills and education.

sen.j: 陰陽師（従七位上相当）6人
sen.e: 6 Onmyoji (master of Yin yang, equivalent to Jushichiinojo)
sen.cmt: リンクが表示されていたため、ウェブサイトの通りに原文を変更しました。
sen.e: 6 Onmyoji (equivalent to Jushichiinojo)
sen.cmt: Deleted "master of Yin yang, " (already defined above)
sen.e: 6 Onmyoji (equivalent to Jushichiinojo)

sen.j: 陰陽博士（正七位下相当）1人
sen.e: 1 onmyo hakase (master of onmyo, equivalent to Shoshichiinoge or Senior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade)
sen.cmt: リンクが表示されていたため、ウェブサイトの通りに原文を変更しました。
sen.e: 1 Onmyo Hakase (equivalent to Shoshichiinoge or Senior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade)
1 Onmyo Hakase (equivalent to Shoshichiinoge [Senior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade])

sen.j: 陰陽生 10人
sen.e: 10 Onmyo no sho (students of onmyo)
10 Onmyo no sho (students of onmyo)
10 Onmyo no sho (students of onmyo)

sen.j: 陰陽得業生
sen.e: Onmyo tokugyo no sho (onmyo students)
Onmyo tokugyo no sho (top onmyo students)
Onmyo tokugyo no sho (top onmyo students)
sen.cmt: 前出用語に合わせました。

sen.j: 天文博士（正七位下相当）1人
sen.e: 1 tenmon hakase (master of astronomy, equivalent to Shoshichiinoge)
sen.cmt: リンクが表示されていたため、ウェブサイトの通りに原文を変更しました。
sen.e: 1 Tenmon Hakase (equivalent to Shoshichiinoge)
1 Tenmon Hakase (equivalent to Shoshichiinoge)

sen.j: 天文生 10人
sen.e: 10 Tenmon no sho (students of astronomy)
10 Tenmon no sho (students of astronomy)
10 Tenmon no sho (students of astronomy)

sen.j: 天文得業生
sen.e: Astrology learners (the studenthood belonging to the office of Ommyo to learn astrology from astrologists)
Tenmon tokugyo no sho (top astrology students)
Tenmon tokugyo no sho (top astrology students)

sen.j: 暦博士（従七位上相当）1人
sen.e: 1 reki hakase (master of reki, equivalent to Jushichiinojo)
sen.cmt: リンクが表示されていたため、ウェブサイトの通りに原文を変更しました。
sen.e: 1 Reki Hakase (equivalent to Jushichiinojo)
1 Reki Hakase (equivalent to Jushichiinojo)

sen.j: 暦生 10人
sen.e: 10 reki no sho (students of reki)
10 reki no sho (calendar students)
10 reki no sho (calendar students)

sen.j: 暦得業生
sen.e: Reki tokugyo no sho (reki students)
Reki tokugyo no sho (top calendar students)
Reki tokugyo no sho (top calendar students)

sen.j: 漏刻博士（正七位下従七位下相当）2人
sen.e: 2 rokoku hakase (master of clock, equivalent to Jushichiinoge or Junior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade)
sen.cmt: リンクが表示されていたため、原文を変更しました。ウェブサイトでは変更した原文のように「正七位下従七位下相当」となっていましたが、「従七位下相当」の間違いであると判断し、「正七位下」は訳出していません。（参照：http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%BC%8F%E5%88%BB%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB http://www.asukanet.gr.jp/ASUKA4/mizutokei/tokei02.html ）
sen.e: 2 Rokoku Hakase (equivalent to Jushichiinoge or Junior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade)
2 Rokoku Hakase (equivalent to Shoshichiinoge and Jushichiinoge [Junior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade])
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて補足しました。

sen.j: 守辰丁 漏刻博士に従って時報の鐘をつく 20人
sen.e: 20 shushincho who ring the time bell in accordance with the rokoku hakase.
20 Shushincho who rang the time bell in accordance with the Rokoku Hakase
20 Shushincho (Timekeepers) who rang the time bell in accordance with the Rokoku Hakase
